activities: The company maintains an authoritative database of contacts in the channel partner sales portion of the Information Technology industry, which includes contact information such as email address, telephone number, mailing address if known, title and company.  We also operate a software platform in which some value-added resellers of products and services share worldwide syndicated content of IT manufacturers; in order to be eligible, these resellers must register in our database by providing their personal contact information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, visitor; including manually processed data
